page.title: 16WINFRITH FIRST SCHOOL 1
page.content: Once a month a Mobile Baby Clinic visits the village.The doctor holds a surgery twice a week.Several villagers told us that they missed having a doctor living in the village.They were also sorry that a Policeman no longer lives in the village.Winfrith is now served by a Community Policeman who lives in Wool.He also visits the school to talk to us about Road Safety Winfrith First School has pupils which come from Chaldon,East Knighton Villages as well as Winfrith Newburgh. The headmistress,Mrs.J.Watson,teaches the Juniors,while Mrs.G.Graham takes the Infant Class.A part_time teacher Mrs.O.Good comes to school on three mornings a week.The children are aged from five to nine years.At nine they go to Bovington Middle SChool.
